bug.author: prasanthpul
bug.description: MacOS build pipelines are timing out waiting for user input to install openssl package

comments.comment: I encountered the same problem yesterday. I am a Mac user and I can help this. Thanks!
This has been addressed by Jacky's PR! <denchmark-link:https://github.com/onnx/onnx/pull/2861>#2861</denchmark-link> .
